parameters.jsCode:
// Process new client data and set up onboarding workflow
const clientData = $input.first().json;

const onboardingPlan = {
  client: clientData,
  onboarding_steps: [
    {
      id: "welcome_package",
      name: "Send Welcome Package",
      description: "Send welcome email with company information and next steps",
      order: 1,
      estimated_duration_hours: 0.5,
      responsible_team: "account_management",
      status: "pending",
      auto_executable: true
    },
    {
      id: "create_client_portal",
      name: "Create Client Portal",
      description: "Set up dedicated client portal with custom branding",
      order: 2,
      estimated_duration_hours: 1,
      responsible_team: "technical",
      status: "pending",
      auto_executable: true
    },
    {
      id: "setup_project_structure",
      name: "Setup Project Structure",
      description: "Create initial project structure and assign team members",
      order: 3,
      estimated_duration_hours: 2,
      responsible_team: "project_management",
      status: "pending",
      auto_executable: true
    },
    {
      id: "configure_billing",
      name: "Configure Billing & Payments",
      description: "Set up billing preferences, payment methods, and recurring charges",
      order: 4,
      estimated_duration_hours: 1,
      responsible_team: "finance",
      status: "pending",
      auto_executable: true
    },
    {
      id: "setup_communication_channels",
      name: "Setup Communication Channels",
      description: "Create Slack channel, schedule kickoff call, and setup regular check-ins",
      order: 5,
      estimated_duration_hours: 1,
      responsible_team: "account_management",
      status: "pending",
      auto_executable: true
    },
    {
      id: "initial_audit_discovery",
      name: "Conduct Initial Audit & Discovery",
      description: "Perform initial website/business audit and discovery session",
      order: 6,
      estimated_duration_hours: 4,
      responsible_team: "strategy",
      status: "pending",
      auto_executable: false,
      requires_client_input: true
    },
    {
      id: "create_strategy_document",
      name: "Create Strategy Document",
      description: "Develop initial strategy and roadmap based on discovery",
      order: 7,
      estimated_duration_hours: 3,
      responsible_team: "strategy",
      status: "pending",
      auto_executable: false,
      depends_on: ["initial_audit_discovery"]
    },
    {
      id: "kickoff_meeting",
      name: "Schedule & Conduct Kickoff Meeting",
      description: "Present strategy, timeline, and officially launch partnership",
      order: 8,
      estimated_duration_hours: 2,
      responsible_team: "account_management",
      status: "pending",
      auto_executable: false,
      depends_on: ["create_strategy_document"]
    }
  ],
  timeline: {
    estimated_completion_days: 14,
    start_date: new Date().toISOString(),
    target_completion: new Date(Date.now() + 14 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString()
  },
  team_assignments: {
    account_manager: clientData.assigned_account_manager || "default-am",
    project_manager: clientData.assigned_project_manager || "default-pm",
    strategy_lead: clientData.assigned_strategy_lead || "default-strategist"
  },
  automation_config: {
    send_daily_updates: true,
    auto_escalate_delays: true,
    client_notification_frequency: "milestone", // daily, milestone, weekly
    internal_reporting: true
  }
};

return [{ json: onboardingPlan }];

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "client_id": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.id }}",
  "template_id": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.service_type || 'seo_standard' }}",
  "project_name": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.company }} - {{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.service_type || 'Digital Marketing' }} Project",
  "project_type": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.service_type || 'seo' }}",
  "priority": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.priority || 'medium' }}",
  "budget": {{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.project_budget || 10000 }},
  "start_date": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.timeline.start_date }}",
  "estimated_duration_months": {{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.contract_duration || 6 }},
  "team_assignments": {
    "project_manager": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.team_assignments.project_manager }}",
    "account_manager": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.team_assignments.account_manager }}",
    "strategy_lead": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.team_assignments.strategy_lead }}"
  },
  "auto_create_tasks": true,
  "auto_assign_resources": true,
  "client_portal_visible": true
}

={
  "channel_name": "client-{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.company.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-z0-9]/g, '-') }}",
  "purpose": "Dedicated communication channel for {{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.company }}",
  "private": false,
  "invite_users": [
    "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.team_assignments.account_manager }}",
    "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.team_assignments.project_manager }}",
    "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.team_assignments.strategy_lead }}"
  ],
  "client_id": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.id }}",
  "pin_welcome_message": true,
  "welcome_message": "Welcome to the {{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.company }} project channel! ðŸš€\n\n**Client:** {{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.name }}\n**Company:** {{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.company }}\n**Service:** {{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.service_type }}\n**Project Start:** {{ new Date($('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.timeline.start_date).toLocaleDateString() }}\n\nLet's deliver amazing results! ðŸ’ª"
}

={
  "template": "portal_access_credentials",
  "to": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.email }}",
  "subject": "Your Client Portal is Ready - {{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.company }}",
  "data": {
    "client_name": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.name }}",
    "company_name": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.company }}",
    "portal_url": "https://portal.agency.com/{{ $('Create Client Portal').item.json.portal.subdomain }}",
    "login_method": "email_link",
    "features": [
      "Real-time project progress tracking",
      "Performance metrics and analytics",
      "Direct communication with your team",
      "Document and report downloads",
      "Invoice and billing management"
    ],
    "support_contact": "support@agency.com",
    "account_manager": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.team_assignments.account_manager }}"
  },
  "priority": "high"
}

={
  "notification_type": "client_onboarding_started",
  "title": "ðŸŽ‰ New Client Onboarding: {{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.company }}",
  "message": "Client onboarding automation has been initiated for {{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.company }}. All initial setup steps are in progress.",
  "recipients": [
    "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.team_assignments.account_manager }}@agency.com",
    "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.team_assignments.project_manager }}@agency.com",
    "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.team_assignments.strategy_lead }}@agency.com",
    "management@agency.com"
  ],
  "data": {
    "client_id": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.id }}",
    "company_name": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.company }}",
    "service_type": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.service_type }}",
    "monthly_value": {{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.monthly_retainer || 0 }},
    "project_budget": {{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.project_budget || 0 }},
    "estimated_completion": "{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.timeline.target_completion }}",
    "portal_url": "https://portal.agency.com/{{ $('Create Client Portal').item.json.portal.subdomain }}",
    "slack_channel": "#client-{{ $('Create Onboarding Plan').item.json.client.company.toLowerCase().replace(/[^a-z0-9]/g, '-') }}"
  },
  "priority": "normal",
  "channels": ["email", "slack"]
}
